properties.description: Triggers Main pipeline to kick off Hydra daily loads on the blob-creation event of 'trigger_batch_daily_hydra.json' in 'triggers' container. This pipeline invocation runs multiple HYDRA data load Projects.

Triggers Main pipeline to kick off SAP CRM daily loads on the blob-creation event of 'trigger_batch_daily_sapcrm.json' in 'triggers' container. This pipeline invocation runs multiple SAPCRM data load Projects.

Triggers Main pipeline to kick off SAP ISU daily loads on the blob-creation event of 'trigger_batch_daily_sapisu.json' in 'triggers' container. This pipeline invocation runs multiple SAPISU data load Projects.
